StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [RCTAPI_GetStateData]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
AS
SET NOCOUNT ON SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
----RssOss.[dbo].[RCTAPI_GetStateData]
DECLARE @result varchar(max)
SET @result = ( SELECT countryId ,stateId ,stateName FROM ( SELECT 1 AS rankOrder ,COUNTRY_DESCRIPTION AS countryId ,COUNTRY_DESCRIPTION + '-' + STATE_CODE AS stateId ,STATE_TEXT AS stateName
FROM MCRISS.[dbo].[GEO_LOCATION] WITH (NOLOCK) WHERE (ISNUMERIC(STATE_CODE) = 1) AND (STATE_CODE <> '00') AND (COUNTY_CODE IN ('000', '0')) AND (CITY_CODE IN ('0', '0000')) AND COUNTRY_DESCRIPTION = 'UNITED STATES'
UNION
SELECT 2 AS rankOrder ,COUNTRY_DESCRIPTION AS countryId ,COUNTRY_DESCRIPTION + '-' + STATE_CODE AS stateId ,STATE_TEXT AS stateName
FROM MCRISS.[dbo].[GEO_LOCATION] WHERE (ISNUMERIC(STATE_CODE) = 0) AND (COUNTRY_DESCRIPTION IS NOT NULL) AND (LTRIM(COUNTRY_DESCRIPTION) <> '') AND (CITY_CODE = '0001') AND (CAST(COUNTY_CODE AS int) = 0) AND STATE_CODE NOT IN ( 'CR' --'CORAL SEA ISLANDS' ,'IO' --'BR INDIAN OCEAN TERR' ) AND COUNTRY_DESCRIPTION <> 'UNITED STATES'
) T
ORDER BY rankOrder,countryId
FOR JSON AUTO, INCLUDE_NULL_VALUES )
SELECT @result
